author: Special Correspondent
text:
The DMK has made representation to the Election Commission seeking transfer of Vellore Collector R. Nandagopal.

In a letter to the EC, the party’s organisation secretary R.S. Bharathi said Mr. Nandagopal was transferred from Vellore during the 2014 Lok Sabha polls only to be reposted in the district after the election because he was loyal to the ruling party.

“He has been functioning as the Collector of Vellore for five years, expect for a brief transfer during the 2014 Lok Sabha polls,” he said.
title: Transfer Vellore Collector: DMK
